name: Procedural Joseph Albers Tribute Urban Night (II)
description: Procedural system built with trapcode form to explore the work of Joseph Albers who is considered one of the most influential teachers of the visual arts in the twentieth century. The challenge was to procedurally generate some kind of an urban top down visuals where the buildings are represented by variations of his minimalist painting "homage to the square". Multiple variations have been created [03-14-19] | 1:1 | 1024x1024 | 120 frames | 30FPS
